bach_open_taxonomy.ObjectivFrame.stack_flows_from_feature_df¶

ObjectivFrame.stack_flows_from_feature_df(stack_column=None, count_method='sum')[source]¶

Function that calculates the links between contexts on the stack. It returns a DataFrame with the links ‘from’ and ‘to’ contexts. This function queries the database.

Parameters

  • stack_column (Optional[str]) – The column that contains the stack for which the links will be calculated. If None, the standard location stack column of an ObjectivFrame is used (‘location_stack’).

  • count_method (str) – The function for aggregating the data.
